adHeader: 24 Hour Mobile Notary for after hours, evenings, late nights
adDetails: Need a notary in San Mateo County? Call us! The Dan Lyons Team provides notary services for the entire Peninsula. We're based in Burlingame but are mobile as well and can travel to you. We offer our services for Loan Documents, Quit Claim Deeds, Notarization of Power of Attorney, Process Serving, Wills and much more. Please call Dan Lyons at show contact info or Brendan Landeck at show contact info and one of us will be happy to assist you. In addition to Burlingame we service Redwood City, San Carlos, Belmont, Foster City, San Mateo, Hillsborough, Millbrae, San Bruno, South San Francisco and Daly City. Different Types of Notary Documents include: Department of Motor Vehicles Transfer 401K, 403K, Retirement Permission For An Adult To Travel With A Minor Legal, Personal and Business Contracts Promissory Notes, Employee Severance Package Out Of State Employee Hiring Package Grant Deeds,Quit Deeds, Notes Conditional Waivers, Lien Waivers and Unconditional Waivers Acknowledgments, Jurats, Affidavits Wills Prepared By An Attorney Only Spousal Divorce Settlements Arrangements Insurance Theft, Insurance Settlements Power Of Attorney Health Care Directives Domestic Partnership Health Insurance and much much more.
